title: TypeScript Best Practices in 2024
description: Master TypeScript with modern best practices, patterns, and advanced type system features

body.raw:
# TypeScript Best Practices in 2024

TypeScript has evolved significantly, bringing powerful type-safety features to JavaScript. Let's explore the best practices for using TypeScript in modern applications.

## Type System Fundamentals

### Advanced Types
